attributes.action: Enforce reduced prices for public and private transport when pollution is high
attributes.background: This has been shown to work very recently in Paris with public transport.  Bringing in new legislation which requires a reduction in the price of Transport in high pollution areas/days will encourage the use of public transport and should also encourage the use of more efficient private transport.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand what action you'd like to be taken on public transport, but we're not sure what changes you'd like to see for private transport. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
